meanings.sent1: After eating too much candy, she barfed all over the floor.
meanings.sent2: The dog barfed up his dinner on the carpet.
meanings.sent3: He barfed so loudly that everyone in the room heard him.
meanings.sent4: The overflowing trash can looked like it had barfed its contents onto the sidewalk.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the barfed milk made her feel queasy.

meanings.sent1: Yesterday, she barfed after eating spoiled food.
meanings.sent2: The baby barfed on his mother's shirt during the car ride.
meanings.sent3: He barfed up his lunch, creating a messy situation.
meanings.sent4: The overflowing toilet looked like it had barfed its contents onto the bathroom floor.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the barfed noodles made her lose her appetite.
